    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<V> matchOr(CommandSender sender)
      Returns all values which match the argument or the given CommandSender if argument is omitted.
      List<V> matchOr(List<V> def)
      Returns all values which match the argument or the given default list if the argument is omitted.
      List<V> matchOr(V def)
      Returns all values which match the argument or a list containing the given default if argument is omitted.
      List<V> matchWithPermOr(String permission, CommandSender sender)
      Same as SenderMatchingArg.matchOr(CommandSender) but also check the given permission if the argument is specified.
